and his fingers twitched nervously. 
"Your excellency!" Prince Andrew broke the silence with his abrupt voice, "you were pleased to send me to Captain Tiishin's battery. I went there and found two thirds of the men and horses knocked out, two guns smashed, and no supports at all." 
Prince Bagrati6n and Tushin looked with equal intentness at Bolk6nski, who spoke with suppressed agitation. 
"And, if your excellency will allow me to express my opinion," he continued, "we owe today's success chiefl
